Topic.Title: Error launching game: the input string has not the correct f

Posts.EditableText:
Hi and sorry if bad english.
Well I downloaded Quest5 for windows from textadventures.co.uk yesterday and tried to create my own game, but when I clicked "play" this message appeared: "Error launching game: the input string has not the correct format"
I tought i had made something wrong and decided to read the tutorial on the Quest wiki, created a new game and tried to prove it without having changed anything and had the same error, then I uninstalled it and installed it again, downloaded a random game from the ones that appear when you start Quest and got the same error.
[img:avg7km9r]http://s22.postimg.org/vd3e7b94x/error.png[/img:avg7km9r]
Then tried the online version and didn't had this problem, so I think it may be my computer, but does someone know how to fix this?
